thread.title: Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not a 'widespread' problem
thread.title_full: Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not a 'widespread' problem

title: Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not a 'widespread' problem
text:
Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not... Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not a 'widespread' problem There are 6 comments on the The Hill story from 10 hrs ago, titled Clinton: Veterans Affairs scandal not a 'widespread' problem . In it, The Hill reports that: 
Democratic primary front-runner Hillary Clinton says the Department of Veterans Affairs scandal is not as "widespread" a problem as coverage of the incident would indicate. She said the problem is real, but cautioned that "it's not been as widespread as it has been made out to be" on MSNBC's " Rachel Maddow Show " on Friday. Join the discussion below, or Read more at The Hill.
